General.Name: Younglimwon Soft Lab Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Younglimwon Soft Lab Co., Ltd. develops enterprise resource planning (ERP) solutions for small and medium companies in Korea. It offers K-System Ace, an ERP solution for corporate digital transformation; and K-System Genuine, an enterprise-architecture solution and business management integration system for general manufacturing and distribution/logistics, equipment manufacturing, engineering/plant, and services/education/leisure/IT/consulting, energy/environment, shipbuilding materials, clothing/apparel and specialized construction, public agency/research center/association, etc., as well as budget management system for public/non-profit sectors. The company also provides SystemEver for the Cloud and the mobile environment; and K-Studio, an enterprise application integrated development environment platform; K-System Mobile for mobile platform; K-System BI for strategic decision-making in a timely manner; K-System IFRS; and K-FTA, a solution that supports any Free Trade Agreement (FTA) with any country, as well as customer support and maintenance services. Younglimwon Soft Lab Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
